short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide HTML DOM content using your customizing CSS selector.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
There is a button that, if pressed by mistake, can cause tremendous damage. By including and configuring this extension, you can disable that button and avoid the danger.

The target button is specified by the CSS selector (e.g. button#so-danger). It is appended inert attribute and transparent a little.
